Text: RE DCto get a message from you even tho I am pretty far away I will check calendar when I get home I am interviewing that week and some are scheduled in hotel and some are on my end of town didnt bring my schedule for that with me We are in meetings from pm so now I see what it must be like on your business trips Did spend an evening with my aunt and cousins on Sunday and one of my first cousins is taking me around tonite for a while Last nite I went on a twilight tour until The monuments are so outstanding especially at night Hope you can take your family hereChris would be in so much awe Glad you had a good time with Carlos I will talk to you this weekend Love MOM Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday May AM To Subject DC I wanted to see if the address worked We had a good time in NO We definitely want to go back It was really crowded but fun The weather was good and the food was great How is DC Have you seen any of the sights yet I wanted to ask if you can help with CC on the th and th of May when we are in Chicago I know your schedule just got alot more hectic so let me know They can stay in Conroe on Fri and Sat We leave Wed night and return Sun morning It would mean be staying at our house on those nights and getting them to school If you cant we will try to get one of the neighbors Thanks See you when you get back DG
